title: Bank of America Posts an Earnings Beat
description:
Bank of America posts solid earnings results—it can thank rising interest rates. Why the British pound is rising. And what we learned from Barron’s latest Big Money poll. Host: Nick Jasinski.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
